questions.prompt: Contained in this montage are works by what American artist?
What is the name of this beloved television character (note, name the character, not the actor)?

A Nahuatl word meaning "concoction" or "mixture" provides the basis for the name of a famous Mexican sauce which has numerous varieties but always prominently features chili peppers, is cooked, and sometimes includes chocolate. What is the generic name for this sauce?
The endearing and influential 1966 documentary The Endless Summer is credited with spreading globally the popularity (and culture) of what sport?
The third-most populous city in Mississippi, Southaven, is a suburb of a city in another state. What is that other city?

What word, defined as an astronomical configuration that occurs when three celestial bodies lie in a straight line, is one of few words in the English language (and the shortest) to contain three occurrences of the letter Y?
